# 8.7 Leadership Development Consultant
## Request for Proposal - CFIA (Canadian Food Inspection Agency)

### Event Details

- **Procurement Reference**: cb-683-25080037 (English) / cb-683-25080037 (French)
- **Procurement Name**: 2024-00521
- **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 29, 2023 (14:00 PM EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 15, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

### Service Details

- **Service Category**: Management Education and Training Services (UNSPSC Code: *86132000)
- **Service Type**: Management development, leadership coaching, and training services for executive leaders.
- **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
- **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Selective tendering

### Bidding Information

- **Greatest Combined Rating**: The RFx process will identify the supplier with the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.
- **Trade Agreements**: No trade agreements are applicable for this procurement.
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contract Details

- **Contracting Entity**: CFIA (Agence Canadienne D'Inspection des Aliments)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0Y9, Canada
- **Contracting Entity Contact**: Alexander Lisowski (Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca) (613) 285-6119

### Procurement Documents

- The procurement documents can be accessed at: 
  - https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27566/2024-00521_npp_%28en.pdf%29 (English)
  - https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27566/2024-00521_npp_%28fr.pdf%29 (French)

### Notice Status

The procurement notice status is **Expired**. 
This is the rewritten version in markdown format. Let me know if you would like me to do anything else!

After reviewing your requested changes to the manuscript, I can make the amendments.
